page.title: 04Employment
page.content: Work in this area is mostly{farming and{tourism.}Farmers are self employed. The people who work on the farm are the farmer, farmer's wife and children, and the farm workers. The Chatsworth{Estate}employs foresters, builders, gardeners, game keeper and office workers. {The Post Office}employs postmen and shop assistants. There are 3{cafes}and one{hotel.}Many of the people who work in these are part time. The old blacksmith's forge is now a cafe and a repair{garage.}Another garage sells petrol and has several large wagons to hire. The Priory{church}has a Rector and part time cleaners and others. Other people travel into towns to work.
